alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 26 at 8:10PM CDT until April 27 at 1:46PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Monticello. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday was 22.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 13.1 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Monticello 22.0 22.0 Tue 7 pm CDT 20.9 19.3 17.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 815 AM CDT.
